typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		USUARIO as string,
		F_ACTUAL as string,
		PROGRAMA as string,
		COD_CLI as string,
		APE1_CLI as string,
		APE2_CLI as string,
		NOM_CLI as string,
		TFNO_CLI as string,
		COD_CALLE as string,
		NUM_PUERTA as string,
		DUPLICADOR as string,
		CGV_CLI as string,
		DOC_ID as string,
		TIP_DOC as string,
		CO_PAIS as string,
		TIP_CLI as string,
		F_ALTA as string,
		F_BAJA as string,
		NRH as string,
		NRH_FAV as string,
		NRH_PEN as string,
		FAX_CLI as string,
		PERS_CONTACTO as string,
		CO_COND_FISCAL as string,
		SOUNDEX_AP1 as string,
		SOUNDEX_AP2 as string,
		REF_DIR as string,
		CUALIF_CLI as string,
		NUM_DEV_CHEQ as string,
		CANT_LETRAS_IMPAGAS as string,
		NUM_FISCAL as string,
		APE1_CLI_UP as string,
		DATOS as string,
		COD_POST as string,
		NIF as string,
		TFNO2_CLI as string,
		DATOS2 as string,
		EST_CLI as string,
		SPEC_SIGNAL as string,
		APE3_CLI as string,
		APE1_CLI_ARAB as string,
		APE2_CLI_ARAB as string,
		APE3_CLI_ARAB as string,
		NOM_CLI_ARAB as string,
		APE1_CLI_ARAB_UP as string,
		IND_CASH_ONLY as string,
		COD_RATING as string,
		F_RATING as string,
		PASSPORT_NO as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		NIF_WORK as string,
		F_BIRTH as string,
		TFNO3_CLI as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		OBSERVACIONES as string,
		PASSWORD as string,
		F_CASH_ONLY as string,
		EMAIL2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Source
Source aggregate(groupBy(PASSWORD),
	Count = count()) ~> Count
Count sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CountImp'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Destination

dependsOn.activity: Add Log Is Destination Table Exists

value.value: @if(equals(coalesce(activity('Get Max Year From Destination').output.firstRow.MaxYear,0),0),'2007',string(add(activity('Get Max Year From Destination').output.firstRow.MaxYear,1)))

ifFalseActivities.name: Add Log Max Year in Destination

ifTrueActivities.name: Copy From Table Source Schema To Destination

dependsOn.activity: Copy From Table Source Schema To Destination

value.value: @concat('------- Start Copy Data from ',item().TableNameSource, ' to ', item().TableNameDestination,' -------')

activities.name: Add Log Is Destination Table Exists

value.value: @if(equals(activity('Lookup Is Destination Table Exists').output.firstRow.Flag,1),'Destination Table is Exist','Destination Table is not Exist')

dependsOn.activity: If Is Staging File Exists - Update
Add Log Is Staging File Exists

ifFalseActivities.name: Add Log Use Existing Staging File

value.value:
@concat('SELECT ',activity('Get Source Columns').output.firstRow.Columns,' FROM ',item().TableSchemaSource,'.',item().TableNameSource,' WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM F_ACTUAL)
=',variables('Year') )

activities.name: Add Log Is Staging File Exists

value.value: @if(item().IsStagingFileExists,'Staging File is Exist','Staging File is not Exist')

activities.name: If Is Staging File Exists - Update

ifTrueActivities.name: Update Is Staging File Exists Column

value.value: @if(empty( activity('Lookup Get Max Date').output.firstRow.MaxDate),concat('SELECT ',activity('Get Source Columns').output.firstRow.Columns,'  FROM ',item().TableSchemaSource,'.',item().TableNameSource),concat('SELECT ',activity('Get Source Columns').output.firstRow.Columns,'  FROM ',item().TableSchemaSource,'.',item().TableNameSource,' WHERE F_ACTUAL >= TO_DATE( ''', split(activity('Lookup Get Max Date').output.firstRow.MaxDate,'T')[0],''', ''yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'' )'))

value.value:
@concat('SELECT USER_CODE
      ,DDI_REF
      ,CUST_ACC
      ,BANK_ACC
      ,COD_AGENCIA
      ,COD_SUCURSAL
      ,IMP_LIMITE_DOMIC
      ,FIRST_PAYMENT_DATE
      ,DIA_VCTO_ANTICIPOS
      ,DD_STATUS
      ,REG_DATE
      ,SIG_DATE
      ,SENT_DATE
      ,APP_DATE
      ,REJ_DATE
      ,REJ_CODE
      ,CAN_DATE
      ,REPLACE( BANK_ACC_NAME,''\'','''') BANK_ACC_NAME
      ,APPLICANT_CPR
      ,REPLACE( APPLICANT_NAME,''\'','''') APPLICANT_NAME
      ,AVG_BILL
      ,OS_AMOUNT
      ,MIN_PAYMENT
      ,DD_MONTHS
      ,DD_REMARKS FROM ',item().TableSchemaSource,'.',item().TableNameSource, ' WHERE  REG_DATE = TO_DATE( ''2017-11-04'', ''YYYY-MM-DD'' ) AND SIG_DATE = TO_DATE( ''2017-11-05'', ''YYYY-MM-DD'' ) AND SENT_DATE > TO_DATE( ''2017-11-08'', ''YYYY-MM-DD'' ) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM FIRST_PAYMENT_DATE) = 12 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM FIRST_PAYMENT_DATE) =10 AND DDI_REF=',pipeline().parameters.DayFrom)

activities.name: Add Log Is Staging File Exists

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT *
FROM all_tab_cols
where UPPER(table_name) = 'RECIBOS' AND VIRTUAL_COLUMN ='NO'
